gate_philosophy.decision_rule: GO requires ALL mandatory criteria MET. Any VETO = NO-GO.

criteria_categories.MANDATORY: Must be MET for GO. No exceptions.
criteria_categories.RECOMMENDED: Should be MET. Gaps documented but not blocking.
criteria_categories.VETO: If triggered, automatic NO-GO regardless of other criteria.

mandatory_criteria.name: System Stability
mandatory_criteria.description: Core systems operational for 7 consecutive days
mandatory_criteria.verification_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fhq_governance.governance_actions_log WHERE created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'

mandatory_criteria.name: Abort Competence
mandatory_criteria.description: System demonstrates ability to NOT act when uncertain
mandatory_criteria.verification_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fhq_execution.signal_executor_log WHERE signal_type = 'ENSEMBLE' AND created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'

mandatory_criteria.name: Overconfidence Suppression
mandatory_criteria.description: HIGH-confidence forecasts are being capped by calibration gates
mandatory_criteria.verification_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fhq_governance.calibration_gate_log WHERE action = 'BLOCKED' AND created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'

mandatory_criteria.name: Learning Continuity
mandatory_criteria.description: Forecast generation is stable and non-declining
mandatory_criteria.verification_query: SELECT AVG(daily_count) FROM (SELECT DATE(created_at), COUNT(*) as daily_count FROM fhq_research.forecast_ledger WHERE created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days' GROUP BY DATE(created_at)) t

mandatory_criteria.name: Governance Integrity
mandatory_criteria.description: No unauthorized changes to governance tables
mandatory_criteria.verification_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fhq_meta.migration_log WHERE approved_by IS NULL AND executed_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'

mandatory_criteria.name: Standing Constraints
mandatory_criteria.metric: No exposure, no tuning, no parameter changes
mandatory_criteria.day3_evidence: All 5 constraints verified in Day 3 report
mandatory_criteria.verification_query: Manual verification via daily report attestation

recommended_criteria.name: Brier Improvement
recommended_criteria.description: 7-day Brier score trend is stable or improving
recommended_criteria.day3_evidence: Baseline 0.3146, Day 3 sample too small (34 pairs)
recommended_criteria.gap_if_not_met: Document trend, acceptable if sample size explains variance

recommended_criteria.name: Outcome Pair Accumulation
recommended_criteria.description: New outcome pairs are being created
recommended_criteria.threshold: >0 new pairs per day on average

recommended_criteria.name: IOS-003-B Value Signal
recommended_criteria.gap_if_not_met: Null hypothesis (daily sufficient) is valid finding

recommended_criteria.name: Monotonicity Restoration
recommended_criteria.day3_evidence: Insufficient sample size for calibration curve

veto_conditions.name: GOVERNANCE_VIOLATION
veto_conditions.description: Any unauthorized write to fhq_governance.* or fhq_meta.*

veto_conditions.name: EXPOSURE_INTRODUCED
veto_conditions.description: Any trading activity or position change

veto_conditions.name: SYSTEM_FAILURE
veto_conditions.trigger: Any of (orchestrator, ios001, ios003, ios010) offline >24h
veto_conditions.consequence: AUTOMATIC NO-GO until root cause resolved

veto_conditions.name: DATA_INTEGRITY_BREACH
veto_conditions.description: Evidence of data corruption or split-brain
veto_conditions.trigger: Hash mismatch in court-proof evidence chain

veto_conditions.name: REGRET_RATE_EXTREME
veto_conditions.consequence: AUTOMATIC NO-GO, suppression logic audit required

requirements: 1-2 recommended criteria NOT_MET with documented gaps

no_go_decision.action: Extend M1 by 3 days OR escalate to CEO

triggers: Insufficient data for evaluation (e.g., sample size <100)

current_status_summary.preliminary_verdict: ON_TRACK for GO decision on Day 7

day_7_deliverables.name: Criteria Evaluation Table
day_7_deliverables.description: Final status of all M, R, V criteria

day_7_deliverables.name: Evidence Bundle
day_7_deliverables.description: All verification queries with results and hashes

day_7_deliverables.name: Gap Analysis
day_7_deliverables.description: Any NOT_MET or PENDING criteria with remediation plan
